ctu_text: {"pageProps": {"schemeData": {"_id": "65abac2d66a1d73a21804a12", "en": {"basicDetails": {"dbtScheme": false, "tags": ["AICTE", "Financial Assistance", "Trainings"], "schemeName": " AICTE SHORT TERM TRAINING PROGRAMME-SFURTI SCHEME", "schemeShortTitle": "ASTPSS", "level": {"value": "central", "label": "Central"}, "schemeType": {"value": "central-sector-scheme", "label": "Central Sector Scheme"}, "schemeCategory": [{"value": "628ce76cd6d1a3bde4685292", "label": "Education & Learning"}], "schemeSubCategory": [{"value": "Education and training grants, fellowship, stipend", "label": "Education and training grants, fellowship, stipend"}], "schemeOpenDate": null, "targetBeneficiaries": [{"value": "institution", "label": "University / Institution"}], "nodalMinistryName": {"value": 488, "label": "Ministry of Education"}, "nodalDepartmentName": {"value": 1608, "label": "Department Of Higher Education"}}, "schemeContent": {"references": [{"title": "Guidelines", "url": "https://www. aicte-india. org/sites/default/files/sfurti/STTP_SFURTI%20scheme%20doc%20amnded%20on%2010%20dec%202021. pdf"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "Short Term Training Programme-SFURTI Program, launched by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), aims to provide financial assistance to the institutions for conducting faculty and student trainings to enable faculty members and students in the field of technical education and to introspect and learn techniques that can help prepare faculty and students to impart their research work in the development of small-scale business for the nation.
